author: kpedro88
body:
In the semi-visible jet signal model, a "stable" hidden valley meson is denoted as a meson that decays to two invisible particles (in order to vary easily the fraction of stable particles). The stable mesons should be produced in pairs, so this filter is used to require that the invisible particles appear in the event in multiples of 4. The filter will be used for central production of signal samples.

This PR will be backported to (at least) 9_3_X for 2017 GEN-SIM production.

attn: @DryRun
title: Filter for semi-visible jet signal production
